document.full_text: ricardo sanchez, who rose from a childhood of grinding poverty in south texas to become a three-star army general and commander of coalition forces in the iraq war, planned to file paperwork on wednesday to run as a democrat for a senate seat.
document.title: retired iraq commander to seek texas senate seat
lines_and_colors: ricardo sanchez, who rose from a childhood of grinding poverty in south texas to become a three-star army general and commander of coalition forces in the iraq war, planned to file paperwork on wednesday to run as a democrat for a senate seat.
